descriptionHtml:
With this mod you can learn a spell to summon a Raven to fight and follow you. There are two .esp files, one is summon Raven, the other is Raven  AS A follower. The Raven has sounds but sometimes are not heard, dont know why. And the follower Raven dismiss command does not dismiss.  These problems I am trying to fix but the CK hates me... So I am uploading this version for now. 
 Watch the videos to see in game.

 The spell tome is at Grave Concoctions in Falkreath..The followers home is Anises Cabin.

 Please comment because it may help to fix the issues I am having.  Thanks BG



 Please ask permission for use and give credits.
author: badgremlin
